title: The argument between Great Britain and its Amer...

content.question: The argument between Great Britain and its American colonies during the 1760’s and 1770’s over “virtual representation” concerned

choices.label: patterns of legislative apportionment in the colonial assemblies
Parliament’s ability to reflect colonial interests
the lack of colonial participation in negotiating the Treaty of Paris
the increasing use of juryless admiralty courts in the colonies
the representation of “free men of color” in colonial assemblies

content.answer: Parliament’s ability to reflect colonial interests

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
